meanings.definition: To design (something) again in a different way.
meanings.sent1: The company redesigned their logo to make it more modern.
meanings.sent2: She redesigned her room by moving the furniture around.
meanings.sent3: The cat redesigned the living room by knocking over all the plants.
meanings.sent4: His life was like a puzzle that needed to be redesigned for a better fit.
meanings.sent5: The garden was redesigned with colorful flowers and winding paths.

meanings.definition: Having been designed again in a different way.
meanings.sent1: The redesigned website was easier to navigate.
meanings.sent2: The redesigned car had a sleek and modern look.
meanings.sent3: The cake looked so good, it was almost too redesigned to eat.
meanings.sent4: Her room felt like a redesigned oasis of calm.
meanings.sent5: The redesigned building stood out with its unique architecture.
